author: Quint Forgey and Josh Gerstein
title: Trump: It’s my decision, not governors’, to reopen country
description: But the law suggests the president has less power than he thinks.
content: The president's social media post contrasted markedly with a directive he issued to governors Sunday via Twitter, ordering them to "get your states testing programs & apparatus perfected. Be ready, big things are happening. No excuses! The Federal Governm… [+3910 chars]
